artist: Painter: After Gabrielle Perelle; Printer: P. Ferdinand; Engraver: Cornelis Danckerts I
description: a.) winter scene; riverwith dwelleings and church on left bank; dwellings on right with men chopping wood; man with donkey hauling wood; snow on dwelling and bushes at right; one of two images partially glued to a single sheet b.) circular design; landscape with 2 men walking down a path in right foreground; a seated figure and a standing figure at left middle ground; two figures in distance and building in far distance
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

a.) in plate in black: G. Perelle in. et fecit   Ianuier  A Paris Chez P. Ferdinand au Faubourg / St. Germain Rue de Seine a la Bergerie / Auvec Privilege du Roy | on sheet in pencil: 2-184

b.) in plate in black: i or 1 in URC; C. Dankerts fec.er.exc.   Perelle inventer  cum Privelegio  | on sheet in pencil: 2-184
title: a) January; b)
